Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at BuddHotel in Moscow (Begovoy), you'll be close to Central Moscow Hippodrome and Red Square. This farm stay is within close proximity of Experimentanium and Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
A complimentary full breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed
A complimentary full breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at BuddHotel in Moscow (Begovoy), you'll be close to Central Moscow Hippodrome and Red Square. This farm stay is within close proximity of Experimentanium and Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Central Moscow Hippodrome - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Experimentanium - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Jewish Museum and Tolerance Center - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Glinka National Museum Consortium of Musical Culture - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Dostoevsky Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Megasport Arena - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Cathedral of the Immaculate Conception - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Tchaikovsky Concert Hall - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Mossovet Theatre - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Central Academic Theatre of the Russian Army - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Central Armed Forces Museum - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Bulgakov Museum - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Satirikon Theatre - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Praktika Theater - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Obraztsov Puppet Theatre - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi

The preferred airport for BuddHotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 22.2 km / 13.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
